data.actual_result: Discord crashes and a new role is made
data.expected_result: New role doesn't get added and is stopped by the save dialog
data.short_description: Adding new role while new changes are being saved crashes Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to roles menu in server settings - Make changes, preferrably a lot of new roles - Hit save button - While it's still saving, try to add a new role
